1

[NEW YORK]1-new york WAS [THE CITY that never slept]1-new york ; it never even got sleepy . [[My]0-dr. petersen condo on [the Upper West Side]298-the upper west side]297-my condo on the upper west side had the level of soundproofing expected in [a multimillion - dollar property]299-a multimillion - dollar property , but still the sounds of [the city]1-new york filtered in — the rhythmic thumping of tires over [the well - worn streets]300-the well - worn streets , the protests of weary air brakes , and the nonstop honking of taxi horns .

As [I]0-dr. petersen stepped out of the corner café onto [always - busy Broadway]301-always - busy broadway , the rush of [the city]1-new york washed over [me]0-dr. petersen . How had [I]0-dr. petersen ever lived without the cacophony of [Manhattan]1-new york ?

How had [I]0-dr. petersen ever managed living without [him]302-him ?

[Gideon Cross]418-gideon .

[I]0-dr. petersen cupped [his]302-him jaw in [my]0-dr. petersen hands , felt [him]302-him nuzzle into [my]0-dr. petersen touch . That show of vulnerability and affection cut right through [me]0-dr. petersen . Just hours before [I]0-dr. petersen ’d thought [he]302-him might never change , that [I]0-dr. petersen would have to compromise too much to share [my]0-dr. petersen life with [him]302-him . Now , [I]0-dr. petersen stood in the face of [his]302-him courage and doubted [my]0-dr. petersen own .

Had [I]0-dr. petersen demanded more of [him]302-him than [I]0-dr. petersen had of [myself]0-dr. petersen ? [I]0-dr. petersen was shamed by the possibility that [I]0-dr. petersen ’d pushed [him]302-him to evolve while [I]0-dr. petersen had remained obstinately the same .

[He]302-him stood before [me]0-dr. petersen , so tall and strong . In jeans and a T - shirt , with a ball cap pulled low over [his]302-him brow , [he]302-him was unrecognizable as the global mogul [the world]303-the world thought it knew but still so innately compelling [he]302-him affected everyone who walked by . In the corner of [my]0-dr. petersen eye , [I]0-dr. petersen noted how [the people nearby]304-the people nearby glanced at [him]302-him , then did a double take .

Whether [Gideon]418-gideon was dressed casually or in the bespoke three - piece suits [he]418-gideon favored , the power of [his]418-gideon leanly muscular body was unmistakable . The way [he]418-gideon held [himself]418-gideon , the authority [he]418-gideon wielded with faultless control , made it impossible for [him]418-gideon to ever fade into the background .

[New York]1-new york swallowed everything that came into it , while [Gideon]418-gideon had [the city]1-new york on a gilded leash .

And [he]418-gideon was [mine]0-dr. petersen . Even with [my]0-dr. petersen ring on [his]418-gideon finger , [I]0-dr. petersen still sometimes struggled to believe it .

[He]418-gideon would never be just [a man]305-a man . [He]418-gideon was ferocity sheathed in elegance , perfection veined with flaws . [He]418-gideon was the nexus of [[my]0-dr. petersen world]303-the world , [a nexus of [the world]303-the world]418-gideon .

Yet [he]418-gideon ’d just proven that [he]418-gideon would bend and yield to the breaking point to be with [me]0-dr. petersen . Which left [me]0-dr. petersen with a renewed determination to prove [I]0-dr. petersen was worth the pain [I]0-dr. petersen ’d forced [him]418-gideon to face .

Around [us]307-we , [the shop fronts along Broadway]308-the shop fronts along broadway were reopening . The flow of traffic on [the street]309-the street began to thicken , [black cars and yellow cabs]310-black cars and yellow cabs bouncing wildly over the uneven surface . [Residents]70-residents trickled onto [the sidewalks]311-the sidewalks , taking [their]70-residents dogs out or heading toward [Central Park]3-central park for an early - morning run , stealing what time [they]70-residents could before the workday kicked in with a vengeance .

[The Benz]71-the benz pulled up to [the curb]312-the curb just as [we]307-we reached [it]312-the curb , [Raúl]2446-raúl a big shadowy figure at the wheel . [Angus]73-angus slid [the Bentley]4-the bentley into place behind [it]312-the curb . [My]0-dr. petersen ride and [Gideon]418-gideon ’s , going to separate [homes]313-homes . How was that a marriage ?

Fact was , it was [our]307-we marriage , though [neither of [us]307-we]314-neither of us wanted it that way . [I]0-dr. petersen ’d had to draw a line when [Gideon]418-gideon hired [[my]0-dr. petersen boss]315-my boss away from [the advertising agency]316-the advertising agency [I]0-dr. petersen worked for .

[I]0-dr. petersen understood [[my]0-dr. petersen husband]317-my husband ’s desire for [me]0-dr. petersen to join [Cross Industries]5-cross industries , but trying to force [my]0-dr. petersen hand by taking action behind [my]0-dr. petersen back ? … [I]0-dr. petersen could n’t allow it , not with [a man like [Gideon]418-gideon]318-a man like gideon . Either [we]307-we were together — making decisions together — or [we]307-we were too far apart to make [our]307-we relationship work .

Tilting [my]0-dr. petersen head back , [I]0-dr. petersen looked up into [his]317-my husband stunning face . There was remorse there , and relief . And love . So much love .

It was breathtaking how handsome [he]317-my husband was . [His]317-my husband eyes were the blue of the Caribbean , [his]317-my husband hair a thick and glossy black mane that brushed [his]317-my husband collar . An adoring hand had sculpted every plane and angle of [his]317-my husband face into a level of flawlessness that mesmerized and made it hard to think rationally . [I]0-dr. petersen ’d been captivated by the look of [him]317-my husband from the moment [I]0-dr. petersen first saw [him]317-my husband , and [I]0-dr. petersen still found [my]0-dr. petersen synapses frying at random moments . [Gideon]418-gideon just dazzled [me]0-dr. petersen .

But it was [the man]317-my husband inside , [his]317-my husband relentless energy and power , [his]317-my husband sharp intelligence and ruthlessness coupled with a heart that could be so tender …

“ Thank [you]418-gideon . ”[0-dr. petersen] [My]0-dr. petersen fingertips brushed over the dark slash of [his]317-my husband brow , tingling as [they]319-they always did when [they]319-they touched [his]317-my husband skin . “ For calling [me]0-dr. petersen . For telling [me]0-dr. petersen about [your]418-gideon dream . For meeting [me]0-dr. petersen here . ”[0-dr. petersen]

“ [I]317-my husband ’d meet [you]418-gideon anywhere . ”[317-my husband] The words were a vow , spoken fervently and fiercely .

[Everyone]320-everyone had demons . [Gideon]418-gideon ’s were caged by [his]418-gideon iron will when [he]418-gideon was awake . When [he]418-gideon slept , [they]319-they tormented [him]418-gideon in violent , vicious nightmares that [he]418-gideon ’d resisted sharing with [me]0-dr. petersen . [We]321-both of us had so much in common , but the abuse in [our]321-both of us childhoods was a shared trauma that both drew [us]321-both of us together and pushed [us]321-both of us apart . It made [me]0-dr. petersen fight harder for [Gideon]418-gideon and what [we]321-both of us had together . [Our]321-both of us abusers had taken too much away from [us]321-both of us already .

“ [Eva]2431-eva … [You]2431-eva ’re the only force on [earth]2332-earth that can keep [me]321-both of us away . ”[321-both of us]

“ Thank [you]2431-eva for that , too , ”[0-dr. petersen] [I]0-dr. petersen murmured , [my]0-dr. petersen chest tight . [Our]321-both of us recent separation had been brutal for [both of [us]321-both of us]321-both of us . “ [I]321-both of us know it was n’t easy for [you]2431-eva to give [me]321-both of us space , but [we]321-both of us needed it . And [I]321-both of us know [I]321-both of us pushed [you]2431-eva hard . … ”[321-both of us]

“ Too hard . ”[0-dr. petersen]

[My]0-dr. petersen mouth curved at the quick bite of ice in [his]0-dr. petersen words . [Gideon]418-gideon was n’t [a man used to being denied what [he]418-gideon wanted]322-a man used to being denied what he wanted . But as much as [he]418-gideon ’d hated being deprived of access to [me]0-dr. petersen , [we]321-both of us were together now because that deprivation drove [him]418-gideon forward . “ [I]321-both of us know . And [you]2431-eva let [me]321-both of us , because [you]2431-eva love [me]321-both of us . ”[321-both of us]

“ It ’s more than love . ”[418-gideon] [His]418-gideon hands banded [my]0-dr. petersen wrists , tightening in the authoritative way that made everything inside [me]0-dr. petersen surrender .

[I]0-dr. petersen nodded , no longer afraid to admit that [we]321-both of us needed [each other]323-each other to a degree [some]324-some would consider unhealthy . It was who [we]321-both of us were , what [we]321-both of us had . And it was precious .

“ [We]321-both of us ’ll drive to [Dr. Petersen]0-dr. petersen ’s together . ”[418-gideon] [He]418-gideon said the words with unmistakable command , but [his]418-gideon gaze searched [mine]0-dr. petersen as if [he]418-gideon ’d asked a question .

“ [You]0-dr. petersen ’re so bossy , ”[0-dr. petersen] [I]0-dr. petersen teased , wanting [us]321-both of us to leave [each other]323-each other feeling good . Hopeful . [Our]321-both of us weekly therapy appointment with [Dr. Lyle Petersen]0-dr. petersen was only hours away , and it could n’t have been more opportunely scheduled .
